detailsData.title: Expert Team
detailsData.content: When you retain our firm to handle your auto accident case, you will work with a team of experts, including an attorney, a case manager, a treatment coordinator, and a paralegal.

detailsData.title: Skilled Negotiators
detailsData.content: Many of our associates worked for insurance companies against injury law firms. With this insider knowledge, we can devise the best plan to maximize your settlement.

detailsData.title: Direct Communication
detailsData.content: You will get a direct number to text and call us. Your dedicated team will view your text and get back to you within a few minutes.

detailsData.title: No Hidden Fees
detailsData.content: We do not charge you any vague or unnecessary fees. We charge only the necessary costs to bring out the best results for your case.

subHeading: Your Solution to an Auto Accident Injury
valueProp: Founding partner Jimin Oh built Solution Now Law Firm in order to bring her years of experience, her compassion, and her dedication to client service to bear in helping accident victims in and around San Jose recover the damages they are owed. Under her guidance, Solution Now Law Firm has developed into a law practice like no other, focused on providing personal attention and care to each and every client. Our San Jose injury lawyers combine excellent, considered legal representation with individualized focus and attention. Our approach is focused on helping auto accident victims not only get the compensation they deserve and the medical care they need but also to feel secure in their path towards the future.
CTA: SCHEDULE A FREE CASE EVALUATION TODAY
